org.kepler.ddp.actor.pattern

Interface DDPPatternActor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Actor, Executable, Initializable, Nameable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomicPathActor, AtomicPatternActor, CoGroup, Cross, DDPDataSink, DDPDataSource, DualInputPatternActor, Map, Match, Reduce, SingleInputPatternActor

    public interface DDPPatternActor
extends Actor
    An interface for all DDP pattern actors.
    Author:
    Daniel Crawl

      • getExecutionClassName

        java.lang.String getExecutionClassName()
                                throws IllegalActionException
        Get the name of the execution class. If no execution class is set, e.g., for composite pattern actors this means the sub-workflow is to be executed, returns the empty string.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException
